Carousel._CircleButtonLabelFormat.comment: Name format for the carousel circle buttons.
Carousel._NextActionLabel.comment: Name of the next button for the carousel.
Carousel._Pause.comment: Name of the pause button for the carousel.
Carousel._Play.comment: Name of the play button for the carousel.
Carousel._PlayPauseActionLabel.comment: Name of the play-pause button for the carousel.
Carousel._PreviousActionLabel.comment: Name of the previous button for the carousel.

Common.ClientRequestAborted: Client request aborted. Please see https://aka.ms/powerAutomateClientRequestAborted for more details.
Common.FailedToFetch: Failed to fetch. Please see https://aka.ms/powerautomate-failedtofetch for more details.
Common._FieldRequiredWithDisplayName.comment: {0} is the name of the field which is required
Common.NetworkError: Network Error. Please see https://aka.ms/powerautomate-networkerror for more details.

NoSearchResults.Details: Check the spelling or try a different word
NoSearchResults.Title: No search results found

Common.NumbersOnly: This field only accepts numeric values.
Common._PositiveNumbersOnly.comment: Generic warning for only positive numbers
Common.SomethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please refresh the page or try again after some time.
Common._SomethingWentWrongShortWithError.commen: {0} is the original message in the error.
Common._Working.comment: General text used in place of a spinner when doing some work.

Error.Message: Invalid date format. Please enter date as YYYY-MM-DD.
Error._Message.comment: Should be YYYY-MM-DD for all locales.

CancelFlowRun.ContentGA: Canceling the flow run '{0}' will also cancel any desktop flow runs associated with it.
CancelFlowRun._ContentGA.comment: {0} is the name of the flow to be canceled

Apply._AriaLabel.comment: text used by a screen reader on the button that applies the selection and closes the panel
Apply._Narrator.comment: Text announced by narrator when apply button had been clicked
Apply._Text.comment: Text displayed on the button that applies the selection and closes the panel

Cancel._AriaLabel.comment: Text used by a screen reader on the button that discards the selection and closes the panel
Cancel._Text.comment: Text displayed on the button that discards the selection and closes the panel

ClearAll._Narrator.comment: Text announced by narrator when the clear all button had been clicked
ClearAll._Text.comment: Text displayed on the button that deselects every values in the panel

SelectionPanel._Header.comment: {0} is the name of the property, {1} is the number of values selected

SearchBox._AriaLabel.comment: {0} is the correponding filtered property (ie. Status, run mode, start time, ...)
SearchBox._NoResultFormat.comment: {0} is the text in the search field
SearchBox._Placeholder.comment: Text displayed as the placeholder of a search bar, used to filter the values in the panel
SearchBox._ResultFormat.comment: {0} is the text in the search field
SearchBox._ResultsFormat.comment: {0} is the number of results (n>1), {1} is the text in the search field

SelectAll._Narrator.comment: Text announced by narrator when the select all button had been clicked
SelectAll._Text.comment: Text displayed on the button that selects every values in the panel

AdminBlockedTrial.Content: Please contact your admin to see if they can unblock you.
AdminBlockedTrial.Title: Trials are blocked by your org's admin
